pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Collection: A non profit group of old time radio collectors
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: The organization has a set of radio historian John Dunning's interviews of radio personalties (about 50+ interviews), approximately 100 scripts of mixed genre, including Escape, First Nighters, Gunsmoke and The Whistler, a collection of 1,200 16" transcription discs of mixed genre, including big bands, AFRS and World War II bond drives that are being transferred to CDs as of 2005 and a lending library of cassettes.
